text: Na dangi xanbi, Yudaya mangɛ Sedekiya, a xa mixie, nun ɲama naxan mu fama faxade fure, santidɛgɛma, nun kaamɛ ra yi taa kui, n fama nɛ e sode e yaxui Babilɔn mangɛ Nebukadansari yi ra, naxan wama e nii bafe. A fama nɛ e bɔnbɔde santidɛgɛma ra, a mu kinikinima e ma fefe ma. Alatala xa masenyi nan na ki.›»
